name: Submarines
description:
Created for the TasGameMakers - April/May TasJam at home 2020

Multiplayer Only!
To play multiplayer the host must either be forwarding the required ports (7777) or all players must be on Himachi.

To Host
Host user must select "Lan Host(H)" button, at this point they are hosting a match.

To Join
Next to the "LAN Client(C)" button, in the input field put the hosts IP (Excluding Port) and then select the "LAN Client(C) " button.
